permafrost.tundra.math

Class BigDecimalHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.math.BigDecimalHelper

  • public class BigDecimalHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with decimals.

    • Field Summary

      The default decimal precision used by the methods in this class.

        The given decimal rounded to the given precision using the given algorithm.

      • round

        public static java.math.BigDecimal round(java.math.BigDecimal decimal,
                                         java.lang.String precision)

        Parameters:
        decimal - A decimal to be rounded.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if the string can be parsed as a decimal number, otherwise false.

        decimalPattern - A java.text.DecimalFormat pattern string describing the format of the given decimal string.

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String decimal,
                               boolean raise)
                        throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if the given string can be parsed as a decimal number.
        Parameters:
        decimal - The string to validate.
        raise - True if an exception should be thrown if the string is not a valid decimal number.
        Returns:
        True if the string can be parsed as a decimal number, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the given string is not a valid decimal number.

      • getMaxPrecision

        private static int getMaxPrecision(java.math.BigDecimal... decimals)
        Returns the maximum precision used by the given list of decimals.
        Parameters:
        decimals - A list of decimals to calculate the maximum precision of.
        Returns:
        The maximum precision used by the given list of decimals.

      • normalizePrecision

        private static int normalizePrecision(java.lang.String precision,
                                      java.math.BigDecimal... decimals)
        Returns the specified precision unless it is null, in which case the maximum precision from the list of decimals is returned.
        Parameters:
        precision - Optional precision to be returned.
        decimals - If precision not specified, the maximum precision from this list of decimals is returned.
        Returns:
        The resolved precision to be used by the caller.

      • normalizeRoundingMode

        private static java.math.RoundingMode normalizeRoundingMode(java.lang.String roundingMode)
        Returns the given rounding mode if specified, or the default rounding mode.
        Parameters:
        roundingMode - An optional rounding algorithm name.
        Returns:
        The rounding algorithm to be used by the caller.
